40541713.review:
To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand Save Jesus. The humour is extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of theoretical physics most of the jokes will go over a typical gamer’s head. There’s also Jesus’s nihilistic outlook, which is deftly woven into his characterisation- his personal philosophy draws heavily from Narodnaya Volya literature, for instance. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of these jokes, to realise that they’re not just funny- they say something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike Save Jesus truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn’t appreciate, for instance, the humour in Jesus’s existential catchphrase “Blessed are the merciful, for they will be shown mercy” which itself is a cryptic reference to Turgenev’s Russian epic Fathers and Sons. I’m smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as Jesus’s genius wit unfolds itself on their television screens. What fools.. how I pity them. 😂

And yes, by the way, i DO have a Save Jesus tattoo. And no, you cannot see it. It’s for the priest's eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that they’re within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kid 😎

40394062.review:
Als ich das  Spiel auf Steam für 0.39€ gesehen haben, dachte ich sollte ich mal holen.
Ich wusste nicht was sich hinter diesen Titel befindet.
 Aber 39Cent ist immer noch 39Cent, und Rettet Jesus ist das nicht mal wert.
Dieses Spiel sieht wie eines dieser Online-Flash-Spiele aus aber nur  schlecht.
Die Idee ist einfach.
Lass einen Ball rollen, um Sterne zu ergattern und römische Soldaten zu ermorden. Warum? Jesus zu retten, denke ich? Es gibt keine Geschichte zum Spiel. Nur 100 "Level", wenn man sie so nennen kann.
Es gibt sicherlich einige Level, die in gewisser Weise "clever" oder gut gestaltet sind, aber es ist nie genau genug, um dich dazu zu bringen, "woah, das war wirklich cool" zu gehen. Das Spiel war irgendwie Greenlit auf Steam, wird aber nicht in Frage stellen.
Ich werde das aber sagen; das Spiel ist urkomisch. Nicht wegen irgendetwas, das das Spiel gut macht.
Vor allem, weil es keinen Sinn macht, und die gelegentliche Stimme "Schauspielerei" scheint dich noch mehr zu amüsieren.
Ehrlich gesagt, weiß ich nicht wirklich, was ich über dieses Spiel sagen soll.
Es ist billig und es ist schrecklich, aber es ist ziemlich amüsant.
Bedauere ich die Stunde, die ich den ersten 40 Levels gewidmet habe? Nein.
Würde ich es empfehlen? Nur wenn Sie eine Weile etwas lachen wollen.

Das Spiel bekommt eine 3/10 von mir.
Es ist nicht gerade glitschig oder fehlerhaft oder kaputt, es ist eigentlich irgendwie gut gestaltet, es ist nur schwer etwas Gutes darüber zu sagen.
Wenn Sie für ein kostenloses Browser-Puzzle-Spiel bezahlen möchten, dann probieren Sie Save Jesus aus.

39936235.review:
This game looks like one of those online Flash Games but bad. The idea is simple. Make a ball roll around to grab stars and murder Roman soldiers. Why? To Save Jesus I guess? There's no story to the game. Just 100 "levels" if you can call them that.

There are certainly some levels that are in some way 'clever' or well designed but it's never exactly good enough to make you go "woah that was really cool." The game was somehow Greenlit on Steam, won't question how though.

I will say this though; the game is hilarious. Not because of anything the game does well. Mostly because it makes no god damn sense, and the occasional voice "acting" appears to amuse you even more.

Honestly, I don't really know what to say about this game. It's cheap and it's awful, but it's pretty amusing. Do I regret the hour I dedicated to doing the first 40 levels? Nah. Would I recommend it? Only if you want something to laugh at for a while.
The game gets a 3/10 from me.

It isn't exactly glitchy or buggy or broken, it's actually designed kinda well, it's just difficult to say anything good about it. If you want to pay for a free browser puzzle game then try out Save Jesus.

39915463.review:
You might look through these reviews thinking: "Man, Is this game really as good as the tales foretell?"
And there is just one answer: "It is even better."
This game will urge you to rethink your whole gaming life up to that point and it changes what you can expect from gaming nowadays.
The saga on which it is based is incredible, almost magical and the way the game incorporates it is so thought through. It makes you ponder what else the amazing world of Jesus has to offer (and it has a lot to offer).
The characters, the gameplay, the astonishingly gorgeous world itself with all its opportunities combined with the plot and drama ascend this game to a higher dimension it seems. It is actually very hard to describe the aspects of the game which make it such an amazing experience. I guess it is just the whole picture which the game draws. While playing the game you can kinda feel the love that is put into every pixel and you just appreciate the amazing work Almighty Games has done.

If you have never played a game of the series and if you are enthusiastic about fantasy worlds with all the wonders they hold, definetly try this game! It will enthrall you. The tons of recommendations and awards this game accumulated are more than deserved.
Now have fun and play this beautiful game.

39179175.review:
Este es uno de esos juegos peligrosos... si te engancha no podrás soltarlo hasta que lo completes, y es que el dichoso jueguecito es muy entretenido.

Básicamente tendremos que superar pantallas a base de resolver un pequeño puzle que consiste en eliminar a unos soldados romanos usando una... "bola de algo", si además recogemos las estrellas de cada fase, tanto mejor.

Los puzzles son muy sencillitos, pero tienen su gracia y eso es lo que hace al juego divertido, siempre apetece probar una nueva aproximación para resolver el problema.

No es un juego que vaya a marcar nuestra vida, pero sin duda por lo que cuesta (apenas un par de euros) lo disfrutaremos y pasaremos unas horas entretenidos, y como además se pueden ir jugando los puzzles según nos venga de gusto, no tendremos que preocuparnos demasiado por quedarnos enganchados en algún nivel.

Se puede disfrutar si tenemos poquito tiempo, ya que cada nivel apenas nos llevará unos segundos... pero si queréis completar todos los logros, posiblemente necesitaréis unas cuantas horas (unas 12 en mi caso).

39134173.review:
Gesu' e' sempre al centro dell' attenzione, anche in questo gioco-puzzle, dove un non precisato cattivo scienziato torna nel passato, si allea coi cattivino Romani, e progetta di far fuori il nostro amico dai mille miracoli, imprigionandolo in livelli rompicapo, dove dovrete usare l'abilita', e la testa, per farlo uscire sano e salvo.
Scopo del gioco e', rompendo i vari quadrati distruttibili, far muovere la sfera mortale (presente in ogni livello), di modo che uccida tutti i romani, ma risparmi Gesu and friends (se poi riuscite pure a raccogliere tutte e tre le stelle, farete il perfect).
Il gameplay e' immediato, la grafica essenziale e carina, l'accompagnamento musicale basilare, tuttavia il gioco risulta interessante, perche' man mano che avanzerete coi livelli, vi renderete conto di come il grado di sfida non sara' cosi semplice,e  quindi richiedera' acume ed impegno.
Quindi un buon puzzle-game, semplice ed essenziale nella realizzazione, ma che risulta' divertente (Seppur l' humor non e' cosi spiccato come sembra dal titolo e dal tema )ed impegnativo.

38741505.review:
My daughter gifted me this.  
It has become our Christmas tradition to find some dirt cheap, laughably bad game during the Steam Winter Sale to give to each other and friends.  This game only fits one of the criteria.  Dirt cheap.  
It is actually a well done, cute, physics based puzzle game.  It isn't overly easy either.  The physics part of it actually comes into play.  A slow rolling ball?  Crate stops it.  Fast moving TNT powered ball?  Shoves the crate and Jesus into the netherworld.  
I played a bit before bed, until I got stuck.  I WILL be coming back to this one.  On sale or full price, it is worth it.  I am actually rather shocked at how beautifully the game worked for something that was near the top of the 'Cheapest first' sort.  So go on.  Save Jesus.

38045925.review:
My thoughts on this game is mixed. It's a fun game and every tenth level the bad guy comes with a time machine with his fake Caesar, which is a reward for going through the levels. The plot of the game is really simple, Jesus is trying to be killed by some athiest nerd from the future who has made sixty traps to kill Jesus. The nerd from the future also has made a fake Caesar who makes the roman soilders that appear theough out the game want to fight you. Also, Caesar is potrayed as a murderous pyscopath often thinking stuff like "Kill Jesus!" or "Kill! Kill! KILL!". The athiest nerd doesn't have terrible voice acting and when he talks you don't here any white noise, his quotes are really good, my favorite being "Why does it even mater to you if you save Jesus? He dies any way." I can't tell if the game is poorly made religous propaganda, an elongated physics test, or just a basic puzzle test  but what ever it is, it works.

The objective is pretty simple: solve a puzzle, use your ball to make one or two Roman soilders die, hopefully get a few stars while doing so, and don't kill Jesus and occasionally one of his friends. The levels start out extremely easy, taking seconds to complete, and a three star victory is almost always ensured and a retry feels like an insult to you. Near the middle of the game levels can be beaten in ten to fifteen seconds, every now and then you'll get two stars but comprihending the puzzles isn't a challange and retrys start to become more frequent but you only kind of feel bad when you mess up. But at the end, the game starts to get frustratingly difficult and it requires you to set up specfic situations for a victory, insuring a three star victory begins to require even more specific situations, levels begin to take over twenty seconds to beat, and re-dos become more and more frequent. But the annoyness of some parts of the game is erased when you kill Jesus with a fat cow falling at one hundred miles an hour.

If you want to get into puzzle games or if you haven't played anything that complex in a while, play this game. It's not a bad game and I would suggest buying it. And even if you do get bored with the game then you can definitly find intresting ways to toture Jesus, or you could work towards getting one of the achievements like "Hell bound" which requires you to kill Jesus fifty times or the achivment "Zealot" which gives you the long task of killing one hundred fifty Romans, which you definitly can't get from playing the first level on repeat for ten straight minutes. My rating for this game is 6/10.

36521391.review:
So first off, this is obviously a mobile game on PC.  If that bothers you then you should know about that up front.

So, while the game does not come with any options you would expect from a PC game (outside of the Unity launch window) it actually ends up being a pretty charming puzzle game.

As you can tell from the video and screenshots in the store the game revolves around completing levels by killing romans and not killing jesus.  The presentation is very consistent, the controls and physics are tight and predictable.  I found the game surprisingly fun and enjoyed the later plot twists (yes, plot twists in a puzzle game).

If you like this sort of puzzle game I recommend this, even though it is a mobile port.

8/10

34447727.review:
[h1]About Save Jesus[/h1]
In this fantasy puzzle game you need to kill Romans, by redirecting traps and keeping Jesus and his friends alive.

[u]Release Date: 4 Aug, 2016[/u]

[h1]The Gameplay[/h1]
I highly recommend this game because there are lots of games with the same price with less fun and less time to end. So this one has 60 levels and if you want to get 3 stars on each level its not easy as you think. When you have free time like waiting for something or speaking with your friends, this game is what you need. It also needs your intelligence. This is not a long term game for sure so just think like a puzzle game which takes max 3 hours to get all the levels done. Well story ends after level 50. But there is kinda stunt levels between 50 and 60 and those are really fun but I can also say that it is really hard I destroyed my brain cells until I finished that thing all 60 levels. 33657963.review:
"Save Jesus" is a puzzle game with physical elements. Your job is to save THE Jesus Christ from Roman soldiers and a couple of other dangers by killing all soldiers and getting rid of traps that would send Jesus to heaven.
You do all that with several types of a ball (a rock with spikes, an inflated cow, a fire ball...), but all these types do the same thing so it's not like one ball is better than another.
You need to let this ball roll the right way and/or with the right timing while considering Jesus' safety and helpful items like explosive boxes that can move things around.
It's very simple and you can figure out the solutions yourself easily, at least in the first 30 or 40 levels. It can get challenging but not to a level that it'd get frustrating. It rather gets boring due to the rather dull and cheap-looking level and sound designs. Also the boss levels are actually like the regular ones, so they are not really exciting.
If you think "Well, Jesus is in it, so some comedy or controversy must be in it": No. He just silently stands around and is the only connection to the bible, it could be any character. This also goes for the Romans who just stand there and actually do nothing. 

"Save Jesus" is a nice little time waster but nothing more. I'd say: Wait for a discount if you are really interested and don't pay too much for this. But it's not a must have. I don't regret trying it out but it reminds me of how little of these physical puzzle games there are like this on Steam and I wish for more and better ones.

32705339.review:
Disclaimer – this game was received as part of a challenge among friends.

Well, that’s 15 minutes of my life I’m not getting back.  The description is accurate, you’re definitely saving Jesus… somehow.  Maybe there’s a big reveal near the end, but I can’t fathom why a time traveler (who seems to have no problem showing up to taunt you periodically) would bother setting up convoluted “traps” to kill Jesus.  

Other questions include: 
[list]
[*]Why are there so many floating platforms in this setting of the Biblical era?
[*]Why are there blocks of explosives randomly scattered around?
[*]Why/how is Jesus immune to said explosives, while a rolling cow(?!) is instantly fatal?
[*]On that note, how on earth are an overweight cow and a strange ball of skulls weapons?
[*]And the biggest question – how are any of these things “traps” in the first place?
[/list]

The gameplay itself seems fine.  Clicking is the only interaction, and it works.  The physics seemed pretty consistent, and the difficulty curve was fine.  Graphically, everything is bright and visible.  It definitely looks like something that would have been an old Flash game though.  I can’t say it’s something I would normally play on a PC, but it would be fine as a time-waster on a cell phone or tablet.

Although the theme seems odd, it’s a perfectly serviceable little puzzle game.  Kudos to those that enjoy it.

32229463.review:
Save Jesus is a physics game where the goal of the game is to get a ball of something (called a weapon) to collect stars, hit the romans, and don't touch Jesus.

The game has a very nice difficulty curve, with the earlier levels being signifcantly easier to lead and teach you how the game works. Some of the later levels are actually quite hard to get 3 stars in, but I was able to 3 star all 50 levels. Overall, the game is still on the easier side of these kinds of games, as I was able to beat all 50 levels in under 1.5 hours. I tried to grind out the rest of the achievements, but I got bored and annoyed by the complete 50 levels using the different types of weapons (essentially making you do each level like 7 times).

The game is very lighthearted, and overall presents itself as a relatively enjoyable game.

Rating: 7.3/10
Recommend Price: $0.79 or under (it is a bit short)

31135954.review:
[h1]Save Jesus[/h1]

Jest grą z gatunku rekreacyjnych i niezależnych. Wydana i stworzona w 2016 roku przez Almighty Games. Jak w tytule, twórcy zapewnili nam możliwość uratowania Jezusa.

Fabuła jest bardzo wciągająca. Zły gość z przyszłości wraz z Cezarem i całym Cesarstwem Rzymskim zastawili pułapki, żeby pojmać i zabić Jezusa. Dzięki różnego rodzaju kulom trzeba przekierować sidła na tych, którzy je zastawili!

Silnik fizyczny, jak na tak prostą grę, robi wrażenie. Grafika jak i muzyka jest fantastyczna i idealnie wprowadza w klimat gry. Dodatkowo jej cena jest na prawdę atrakcyjna.

Reasumując, do plusów gry możemy zaliczyć:
- silnik fizyczny
- grafikę
- muzykę
- niską cenę
- poprawność w sferze fabularnej
- czas potrzebny do zakończenia głównej fabuły
- niski poziom trudności
- klimat, do którego chce się wracać.

Natomiast do ewidentnych minusów trzeba zaliczyć:
- irytujące dialogi wrogich AI
- chwilowe zacinanie się gry przy włączaniu jakiegokolwiek poziomu
- kontrowersyjna tematyka religijna w grze.

Serdecznie polecam tę grę, jest warta uwagi jak i godna polecenia.

Pozdrawiam
Paweł

Well, I had some laughs. Had some laughs with with my daughter. Sometimes we enjoyed watching Jesus be killed so that we could hear the lovely music play and watch him ascend to heaven. Sounds terrible, I know. I feel awful for just saying it.

Truth be told, it's a great little game that seems really simple at first, but as you go along, the puzzles do become harder and you'll often be surprised at the outcome of something you initially thought was going to be very simple.

For the price, pick it up. I think I got it for about a quarter or something on sale. It's another one of those games where even if you don't like it, selling the trading cards off will pay for the game itself. You've got nothing to lose (especially not Jesus' love), and everything to gain (your soul being saved for saving the Son of God).

Don't be a Judas! Buy this game and set your soul free (and save Jesus too!)

사실 : 예수님은 죽일 대상을 찾기 위해 로마제국을 탄생시켰다.

그는 손을 대지 않고도 전능한 능력으로 지형을 바꿀 수 있다.

예수님은 사실 마구간에서 태어나지 않았다. 마구간이 예수님을 위해 생성된 것일 뿐이다.

성모 마리아는 그의 어머니가 아니다. 예수님이 그녀를 낳았다.

기독교는 원래 예수를 두려워하여 그의 노여움을 사지 않기 위해 만들어진 광신도 집단이었다. 그가 선처를 해주기 전까지는.

십자가는 예수가 매달린 기구가 아니다. 본래 그가 로마군을 고문할때 쓰던 기구이다.

예수가 양을 키우기 이전에 양이란 생물은 존재하지 않았다.

지구는 본래 숨조차 쉴수 없는 황량한 땅이었다. 그가 지구가 변하길 원하기 전까지는.

본래 지구는 평평한 행성이었다. 하지만 예수가 개인공간을 원하였고, 땅을 동그랗게 휘어서 자신의 개인공간을 만들었다. 이것이 지구 공동설의 발원지이다.

풀들은 자라나는것이 아니다. 예수에 의해 강제로 땅에서 끌려나오고있을 뿐이다.

예수는 부활하지 않았다. 죽은 적이 없기 때문에.

예수는 바다 위를 걷지 않는다. 바다가 그를 보고 겁에 질려 굳어버렸을 뿐이다.

오병이어의 기적은 예수의 권능이 아니다. 빵과 물고기가 그의 심기를 거스르고 싶지 않아 자가복제를 헀을 뿐이다.

성경의 내용은 사실이 아니다. 예수를 두려워한 그의 제자들이 보복이 두려워 그를 미화시켜 적은것이 성경이기 때문이다.

척 노리스가 강력한 이유는 유일하게 예수가 신경쓰지 않는 인간이 척 노리스 한명 뿐이기 때문이다.

테러리스트들은 테러를 직접적으로 일으킨 적이 없다. 항상 예수가 테러리스트보다 먼저 테러를 가했다.

DEVGRU는 빈 라덴의 사살 작전에 투입되지 않았다. 오바마가 예수에게 빌고 빌어 그가 빈 라덴을 처리했기 때문에.

지구가 자전하는 이유는 예수가 조깅을 할때마다 그 반동으로 지구가 회전하기 때문이다.

예수는 물과 기름을 섞을 수 있다.

예수의 집에는 동물 박제가 많다. 하지만 사실 그 동물들은 박제된 것이 아니라 움직이는 것이 두려워 가만히 있는 것이다.

화성의 외계인 탐사 작전이 실패하는 이유는 간단하다. 예수가 화성의 외계인을 전부 몰살해버렸기 때문이다.

슈퍼맨은 예수에게 반기를 든 최초의 인물이다. 하지만 그는 이때의 충격으로 언제나 바지 위에 팬티를 입게 되었다.

예수는 물 속에서 빵을 구워버릴 수 있다.

진화론을 주장한 다윈은 사실 예수의 창조물이었다.

극지방의 얼음이 녹는 이유는 예수가 그곳을 응시하고 있기 때문이다.

인간은 본래 늙지 않는다. 예수가 인간의 생명력을 조금씩 빨아먹고 있을 뿐이다.

스탠리는 무능한 3류 만화 작가였다. 그가 예수를 영접하기 전까지는.

세계 각국의 신화에 등장하는 신들은 예수가 하늘에서 오줌을 싸자 떨어진 방울에서 창조된 생명체이다.

식물인간들은 몸을 움직일 수 있다. 하지만 예수를 보고 난 이후 겁에질려 움직이지 못하는 것 뿐이다.

지금 이 순간에도 예수는 당신의 등 뒤에서 당신의 생명을 호시탐탐 노리고 있다.

Jesus[e] (/ˈdʒiːzəs/ jee-zuss; c. 4 BC – c. AD 30/33), also referred to as Jesus of Nazareth or Jesus Christ,[f] was a Jewish preacher[13] and religious leader who became the central figure of Christianity. Christians believe him to be the Son of God and the awaited Messiah (Christ) prophesied in the Old Testament.[14][15]

Virtually all modern scholars of antiquity agree that Jesus existed historically,[g] although the quest for the historical Jesus has produced little agreement on the historical reliability of the Gospels and on how closely the biblical Jesus reflects the historical Jesus.[22][23][24] Jesus was a Galilean Jew[13] who was baptized by John the Baptist and subsequently began his own ministry, preaching his message orally[25] and often being referred to as "rabbi".[26] He was arrested and tried by the Jewish authorities,[27] and was crucified by the order of Pontius Pilate, the Roman prefect.[28] Jesus debated fellow Jews on how to best follow God, performed healings, taught in parables and gathered followers.[28] After his death, his followers believed he rose from the dead, and the community they formed eventually became the Christian Church.[29]

His birth is celebrated annually on December 25 (or various dates in January for some eastern churches) as a holiday known as Christmas, his crucifixion is honored on Good Friday, and his resurrection is celebrated on Easter. The widely used calendar era "AD", from the Latin anno Domini ("in the year of our Lord"), and the alternative "CE", are based on the approximate birth date of Jesus.[30][31]

Christian doctrines include the beliefs that Jesus was conceived by the Holy Spirit, was born of a virgin named Mary, performed miracles, founded the Church, died by crucifixion as a sacrifice to achieve atonement, rose from the dead, and ascended into Heaven, whence he will return.[32] Most Christians believe Jesus enables humans to be reconciled to God. The Nicene Creed asserts that Jesus will judge the dead[33] either before or after their bodily resurrection,[34][35][36] an event tied to the Second Coming of Jesus in Christian eschatology.[37] The great majority of Christians worship Jesus as the incarnation of God the Son, the second of three persons of a Divine Trinity. A minority of Christian denominations reject Trinitarianism, wholly or partly, as non-scriptural.

In Islam, Jesus (commonly transliterated as Isa) is considered one of God's important prophets and the Messiah.[38][39][40] Muslims believe Jesus was a bringer of scripture and was born of a virgin but was not the Son of God. The Quran states that Jesus himself never claimed divinity.[41] To most Muslims, Jesus was not crucified but was physically raised into Heaven by God.

Judaism rejects the belief that Jesus was the awaited Messiah, arguing that he did not fulfill Messianic prophecies and asserting that the resurrection is a Christian legend.[42]

Etymology
Further information: Jesus (name), Holy Name of Jesus, Names of God in Christianity, Yeshua, and Isa (name)

Hebrew, Greek and Latin transcriptions of the name Jesus
A typical Jew in Jesus' time had only one name, sometimes supplemented with the father's name or the individual's hometown.[43] Thus, in the New Testament, Jesus is commonly referred to as "Jesus of Nazareth"[h] (e.g., Mark 10:47).[44] Jesus' neighbors in Nazareth refer to him as "the carpenter, the son of Mary and brother of James and Joses and Judas and Simon" (Mark 6:3),[45] "the carpenter's son" (Matthew 13:55),[46] or "Joseph's son" (Luke 4:22).[47] In John, the disciple Philip refers to him as "Jesus son of Joseph from Nazareth" (John 1:45).[48]

The name Jesus is derived from the Latin Iesus, a transliteration of the Greek Ἰησοῦς (Iesous).[49] The Greek form is a rendering of the Hebrew ישוע‎ (Yeshua), a variant of the earlier name יהושע‎ (Yehoshua), in English "Joshua".[50][51][52] The name Yeshua appears to have been in use in Judea at the time of the birth of Jesus.[53] The first century works of historian Flavius Josephus, who wrote in Koine Greek, the same language as that of the New Testament,[54] refer to at least twenty different people with the name Jesus (i.e. Ἰησοῦς).[55] The etymology of Jesus' name in the context of the New Testament is generally given as "Yahweh is salvation".[56]

Since early Christianity, Christians have commonly referred to Jesus as "Jesus Christ".[57] The word Christ is derived from the Greek Χριστός (Christos),[49][58] which is a translation of the Hebrew משיח (Meshiakh), meaning the "anointed" and usually transliterated into English as "Messiah".[59][60] Christians designate Jesus as Christ because they believe he is the Messiah, whose arrival is prophesied in the Hebrew Bible and Old Testament. In postbiblical usage, Christ became viewed as a name—one part of "Jesus Christ"—but originally it was a title.[61][62] The term "Christian" (meaning a follower of Christ) has been in use since the first century.[63]

Canonical gospels
The four canonical gospels (Mark, Matthew, Luke, and John) are the only substantial sources for the life and message of Jesus.[64] Other parts of the New Testament, such as the Pauline epistles, written decades before the gospels, also include references to key episodes in his life, such as the Last Supper in 1 Corinthians 11:23.[65][66][67] Acts of the Apostles (Acts 10:37–38 and Acts 19) refers to the early ministry of Jesus and its anticipation by John the Baptist.[68][69] Acts 1:1–11 says more about the Ascension of Jesus (also mentioned in 1 Timothy 3:16) than the canonical gospels do.[70]

うーん、面白のか面白くないのか微妙なゲーム、クソゲーって言われるとそこまでじゃないってなるし、面白いのって聞かれると何とも言えない、携帯ゲームだったら、待ち合わせとか時間潰すときにちょっとだけやるようなゲームかな、あーでも自分だったらこれやるならクラロワのほうが全然面白いなｗ

29325755.review:
Where do I start? 

This is possibily the greatest game I have ever played. I have bought this game for a few friends and they share the same oppinion. 

Graphics. 10/10
Stunning visuals on the 'fantastic' video setting, this is the most realistic breaking of sand blocks I have seen since Minecraft.

Story. 9.8/10 
Save Jesus has a brilliant story about the roman army being commanded by the super-athiest science man, you play as a Godly figure (when it comes to breaking sand blocks) who is trying to save Jesus, who I assume to be Martin Bryant.

Gameplay. 10/10
Stop cows, large stones, balls of human skulls, flaming stones and some sort of unholy light source from killing Jesus by breaking sand that supports the dangerous objects and crushing the roman army. It gets difficult around 13 and sometimes makes me want to pull my cross off of my wall and smash it through the screen in the name of God, but most levels are just right.

Overall. 99/100
The 1 that is missing is from making me cry at the end of the game.

29118764.review:
Casual timing puzzle game.

It took me less than an hour to beat 38 of these 50 levels, I'm now stuck on 39 trying to figure out the correct sequence and timing to trigger these exploding crates. The whole game is like that: you need to time your drops to movement in the level, time explosions just right, and repeat the level over and over until you get it right if you didn't. (And then repeat some more if you want to 100% it, because you have to beat each level with each of the 7 types of balls that seem to play exactly the same.) Other than that, it's not difficult, 3 stars per level notwithstanding: on many levels, you can't even complete it with less. I don't understand how a simple game like this can hog over 600 MB of disk space.

It's not my idea of fun.

[i]The game does run windowed, and it also runs fine on older systems.[/i]

29085570.review:
[b]Save Jesus[/b] - простенькая головоломка, в которой необходимо уничтожить огромным шаром (в виде коровы, кучи черепов и т.д.) агрессивных римлян под предводительством лжеЦезаря, который является марионеткой путешественника во времени и при этом не навредить главному герою и его фанатам.

+ За персонажей (особенно за ласт босса и его комментарии).
+ За приятную картинку.
- За сложность. Очень, Я бы даже сказал «крайне», легкая (исключение составляют уровни, где есть какие-либо движущиеся объекты. Там рандом, приходится подгадывать момент. Но таких уровней и десяток не наберется).
- За однообразный геймплей (кликаем по обычным и взрывающимся блокам).
- За однообразную музыку.
- За отсутствие возможности выбора типа шара (затрудняет получение достижений).
- Встречаются проблемы с физикой этого самого шара.
- За отсутствие сюжета (тут Я уже просто прикопался).

[u][b]Резюмируя:[/b][/u] можно поубивать время, но игра не затягивает. Как по мне, отлично бы смотрелась на планшете.

[h1]Оценка игры: [b]карточки[/b].[/h1]

28191538.review:
Save Jesus is the newest installment of the Bible series. You play as God and your main goal is to protect Jesus from the soldiers from hell. THIS REVIEW WILL HAVE SPOILERS

Story: 5/5. The story was well made. After the annexation of Serbia, roman forces have been cracking down everywhere looking for the son of God, Jesus Christ. Jesus, is crippled and injured after the bombing attacks, and asks for the help of God. God realizes that it is not Jesus's time yet so he comes down to help his injured son. He and his son are attacked and are surrounded by the Romans. Throughout the game, Jesus and God make the hardest descisions any man could ever make, in order to escape from the Roman's wrath. Once Jesus is at the gates, the future Jesus, Jesus 2.0, is sent back in time to kill his past self in order the fix the chaos brought to the world. God is left paralyzed as he is there to watch his son kill his son. Once Jesus 2.0 pulls the trigger, he noticies the future has not changed. He then comes to the conclusion that this was a clone of Jesus. Throughout the rest of the game, you play as Jesus 2.0, who had to cut his own toe off in order to find Christ. Christ 2.0 grabs the cross and fights Jesus, once Jesus lies weakened, he understands that his fate has come and is crucified by 2.0. But then jesus is knocked off the cross and then Julius Ceaser comes in, and enters his true form. Jesus 2.0. sacrifices himself in order to save the world. Jesus is then crucified and the future is saved. The story, as you can tell, should be concealed in a time capsule so the future civilization can see our achievments. The story is the best video game story ever. 

Gameplay: 5/5. The gameplay is original and innovative. The physics in the game feel realistic, the controls are amazing, not too stiff and not too floaty. The graphics are also stunning, as you can see, this was their main focus. This is next gen times a gazillion. Truly in a league of it's own

Soundtrack: 2/5: The soundtrack is forgetable, but, you're given the option to mute the music so it's okay.

Verdict: The game has skipable cutscenes, an excellent story, great graphics and gameplay, and deserves a 9.5/10. Truly game of the year.

28121648.review:
PUò  sembrare un giochino banale a prima vista ma non lo è vi spiego i motivi .
E' un gioco strutturato in 2 D ad enigmi, basato su vari livelli, con una difficoltà che va crescendo , ce ne sono ben 50 di livelli ufficiali,  piu  altri 10 extra .
Praticamente  in ogni livello cè una palla che scende  dall'alto , lo scopo è quello di abbattere i soldati e le guardie romane senza far del male a Jesus , e raccogliere più stelle  che potete , 
La grafica è carina con i personaggi disegnati come in un bel cartone animato, devo dire che man mano si avanza nel game gli autori hanno avuto fantasia, perchè bisogna ingegnarsi veramente a far arrivare la palla dove vogliamo noi , attraverso ponti, cerchi ,varie discese e usando casse e la dinamite nel modo giusto; oltre a capire come procedere dobbiamo tenere conto delle leggi della fisica perchè ad ogni azione corrisponde una reazione...per cui non sempre la palla andrà dove pensiamo noi .
Lo consiglio a tutti perchè costa pochissimo, ha le carte, ed è un diversivo al solito gioco, non dobbiamo usare la forza ma
spremere le meningi e perchè no! metterci un pochino alla prova per vedere cosa siamo in grado di fare, sinceramente vi devo dire che pensavo fosse più difficile, tranquilli fino a 25 - 30 livelli ci arrivate tranquillamente anche divertendovi .
Cmq se vedete i miei  screen sono riuscita ad arrivare a 50 e anche oltre qualche livello extra , se ci sono arrivata io che non sono chissà che..... ( sono negata in fisica ) TRANQUILLI!! sono sicura che riuscirete anche voi ...provare per credere!!

26503813.review:
RECENSIONE IN LINGUA ITALIANA

INFORMAZIONI BASE

Titolo: Save Jesus
Genere: Casual, Indie
Sviluppatore: Almighty Games 
Editore: Almighty Games	
Data di rilascio: 4 ago 2016

IMPRESSIONI PERSONALI

Save Jesus è un rompicapo 2D nel quale devi salvare Gesù e i Suoi discepoli da alcune trappole imprevedibili e reindirizzare queste ultime verso i legionari Romani .Il gioco è strutturato in 15 livelli a difficoltà crescente con sfondi di vario tipo.In ogni livello il tuo scopo sarà quello di uccidere i Romani con una palla che si muoverà autonomamente però potremmo spostarla indirettamente distruggendo blocchi posti nella mappa in punti tattici o innescando delle esplosioni.
Nonostante il titolo sia a sfondo blasfemo non è molto pesante come può essere su giochi come GREZZO 2 e può far strappare 2 risate dalla bocca di chiunque .

PRO 

-Difficoltà dei livelli crescente e ben organizzata
-Achievemente e carte su Steam 
-Grafica semplice ed apprezzabile
-Non richiede hardware di prestazioni elevate (in ogni caso ho un i7-6700 e una GTX 960 4GB) 

CONTRO

-Bassa durata di gioco
-Prezzo troppo alto (comprato con coupon)
-Anche se inizialmente può far ridere , il tema relgioso risulta ripetitivo e noioso

FINALE

Se avete un po' di tempo da buttare o volete fare delle carte questo è il gioco per voi .Anche se siete religiosi non preoccupatevi perchè il tema religioso viene trattato in maniera piuttosto rozza ed ignorante ,dedita solamente a strappare un sorriso .

Честно скажу, игруля на разок - перепроходить ее вряд ли захочется. Зато она очень веселая и крайне залипательная - определение timekiller точно про нее. Саунд ненавязчивый, приятный. 
Но главный ее плюс, конечно же, HOLY COW BALLS, ибо  что может быть забавнее, чем убийство римлян шарообразной коровой?
Достижения простые, но времязатратные. У меня ушло около 4 часов, чтобы получить всё. Карточки дешевые, половину получите за время, проведенное в игре, остальное докупите или наменяете в сообществе - значок для коллекции весьма  симпатичный.
Приятного времяпрепровождения!

26283236.review:
Save Jesus is a casual puzzle game with a single basic focus for each level: Save Jesus (and at times, his friends) from being killed by traps set by Romans and other antagonists, and use the traps against the Romans themselves and later time traveling imposters who threaten Jesus.

Typical levels are won by eliminating every Roman soldier from the map using boulders, and require an increasing amount of timing, effort, and strategy by the player to beat each level.

Each level has three stars for the player to collect, that, while the player can ignore and beat the game regardless of them, a completionist will be given pleanty of encouragement to pursue the goal of getting each star in the game, and for that reason, levels' difficulties will increase should the player want to collect all of the stars in the game, which increases the entertainment value as a whole.

On a technical level, the game has excellent audio assets and visual elements that fit the theme and context and concept of the game perfectly, and its usage of voice acting is just as great, with voice lines only being used in certaint stages o the game, each instance being accurate and not coming off as being awkward, poorly recorded, or out of place.

The game in general is a fun, inexpensive, and an all-around great title. It's on sale as of my writing of this review for a dollar but is regularly only twice this. I highly suggest that you buy this game, it's a perfect blend of difficulty and fun, and it's an outstanding example of a casual title that you can lose a few hours in saving Jesus from the Romans and Time Travelers.

Вот понимаете, я не могу поставить игре дизлайк. Но в тоже время есть такое желание, при чем очень сильное. Я из-за этого не могу сказать что она хорошая.
начнем с плюсов:
+ Хорошая красивая графика, милая мультяшная, все яркое и цветное, вообщем как по мне прям красота=)
+ Не плохое музыкальное сопровождение в течении всей игры, но из-за минусов ниже описанных от него начинает уже тошнить.
+- Не скажу что он хорош 100%, ибо это не так. Что меня бесило в течении всей игры так это то, что ты делаешь по 10 раз одно и тоже, но шар летит порой абсолютно по разному, и ты начинаешь сначала и сначала и сначала, ну а если вы мазахист вроде меня и пытаетесь сделать 100% ачивок, то можете вешаться, у меня уже под конец просто полыхало от этого дерьма=)
+ Если играть по фану, не задрачивать и не делать ачивки принципиально как я, то игра в принципе суперская, особенно за те деньги, господи - это шедевр=)
- Ужасные ачивки, разрабы, вы там че любители бдсм? Проходить каждый уровень по 7 раз для ачивки, да ну нахер! У меня пригорело к концу игры не по детцки, но я боролся как лев и открыл все достижения...
- Опять же ко всему добавляется минус описанный выше, про то что шар летит хрен знает куда, хотя ты все делаешь как уже делал 90000 раз. 
Кстати в одном из руководств к игре, прочитал что мол шары, не различаются по статам. Так вот не фига! Как по мне шары в виде коровы и черепов, самые мать их дибильные, они не только больше обычных в габаритах, но и к тому же не катятся по земле практически. То есть если вы немного неудачно кинули шар, есть вероятность что он докатиться до цели, но с этими двумя кусками говна, такого не прокатит в 99% случаев, ну ни чего сами всё увидите=) 
Игру покупайте даже не задумываясь, за почти даром, она реально топовая, а учитывая что не все будут дрочить как я на ачивки, так и вообще все круто!

26082163.review:
(Props to Menin Gate for gifting me this game during another bout with depression.  Thanks, man.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bIMluNAONCE

(If the video is removed:  Zoidberg zaying "AND I'M HIS FRIEND JESUS!")

Let me start out by saying I'm a former catholic and am currently an Apathetic Agnostic...which means I don't KNOW what happens when you die (agnosticism) and I don't CARE what happens when you die (apatheism).

That being said, I actually enjoyed this game.  It's essentially a puzzle game about destroying certain units while sparing certain units...more credit to you if you can get all stars along the way.

The plot is about some unknown AVGN-type guy who travels back in time to try to kill Jesus and his followers...Well...calling "Jesus" an actual person in the past is....debatable.  And maybe the world would be better if certain stories were never written....   You're given various death balls that can kill Romans, Jesus, and Christians....so...there's that.

One problem I have is that there are times where the ball won't act with the puzzle as you'd expect though many tries will eventually find you success.  So, sometimes the solution is hit-and-miss...  The voice-acting is kinda' annoying from the time traveler and wish he'd just shut up (don't know why he sounds like a Texas Hick, though...).

For asking price ($2), I would say it's best to avoid this title as it seems to be just a mobile port of a puzzle game.  But when it's on sale ($0.50), it's a little more fair....though I would say a fair price would be about $0.25.

If you're looking for a quick puzzle game to play, think about picking up [i]Save Jesus[/i].....or maybe you can kill Jesus, I don't really care....

7/10  I got to save Jesus....but then he got crushed by a cow anyway....whoops....

Man verhindert also das Jesus früher stirbt den es macht sich nicht gut wenn in der Bibel stehen würde: ,,Und als Jesus so dastand wurde er plötzlich von einem Felsen zermalmt. Seine Jünger betrachteten den nun platten Jesus und trauerten um ihn. Seitdem hängt in jedem Bayrischen Haushalt eine Fußmatte an der Wand." Oder aber: ,,Und als Jesus seine Predigt beendet erstrahlte ein greller Blitz gefolgt von einem Ohrenbetäubenden Knall. Als seine Jünger wieder sehen konnten beschlossen sie ALLE Einzelteile wiedereinzusammeln. Bis heute durchsuchen sie noch die Wüste nach den Teilen ihres Herren und Meisters." macht sich nicht gut in der Bibel (obwohl es Passagen über Geschlechtsakte, Morde Inzest und Vergewaltigungen gibt...)

Zurück zum Spiel: Es ist wirklich einfach gebaut. Ziel ist es alle Römer mit einem gelangweilten Gesichtsausdruck zu vernichten mittels einer Kugel. Dabei darf Jesus nicht von der Kugel erwischt werden. Anfangs ist es einfach. Man lässt ein paar Blöcke zerspringen und die Kugel rollt munter los. Dann kommen immer mehr Blöcke hinzu mit verschiedenen Eigenschaften und so steigert sich das Spiel langsam aber stetig zu einer Herausforderung. Hinzu kommt das man versuchen muss alle 3 Sterne in dem Level zu sammeln was die schwierigkeit noch mal erhöht.

Das Spiel hat eine saubere Physik Engine, so das auch der kleinste Mausklick eine nette Kettenreaktion verursacht. Alles in allem ein gutes solides Spiel was ich jedoch eher auf dem Tablet spielen würde da es mehr Spaß macht mit dem Finger statt der Maus dinge ins ,,rollen" zu bringen. Auch der Preis ist angemessen für das Spiel. Ein netter und voralldem Herausfordernder Zeitvertreib ohne irgendwelche lästige Religions Botschaften (du sollst nicht stehlen, du sollst nicht töten, du sollst nicht lachen und andere Gebote halt.)

10/10 sehr gut gelungen und ein Vorbild für andere Smartphones und Tablet Spiele (wenn es nicht gerade in der Hosentasche explodiert...)

25552527.review:
Le jeu est à placer directement dans ces petits jeux à la con qu'on aime bien vite fait mais pour lesquels on ne paie pas (perso je l'ai acheté 20cents..).
Le concept est marrant : un type vient du futur dans une machine à voyager dans le temps et il ramène un Jules César et ses romains pour tuer Jésus.
Le rôle du joueur c'est tourner le décor à son avantage pour que les projectiles (que ce soient des boules de feux, des vaches, des boules d'os, des masses, etc) touchent les romains et non Jésus (ni ses apôtres, d'ailleurs). Un genre de Angry Birds en fait.
Il y a 50 niveaux à faire et à la fin, il faut détruire la machine du vilain avec ses propres projectiles.
Pas un jeu méga compliqué même si certains niveaux sont plus chauds que d'autres.
Il est sympa à faire mais une seule fois donc si vous l'avez gratuitement ou pour moins d'un euro, prenez le mais sinon, non.

[h1]A Physics-Based Puzzle Game[/h1]
https://youtu.be/3VOlPoL_QzU
+ The gameplay is pretty simple but pretty fun for a puzzle game. You mainly break blocks which changes the direction of the ball. The goal is to direct the ball to kill the guard, but avoid hitting Jesus.
+ Every puzzle is unique and very different from one another keeping the game from feeling repetitive. 
+ A very silly and comical story where an evil imposter from the future is trying to get the Romans to kill Jesus. The imposter appears in a flying time machine and has some pretty amusing dialogue. "This is a time machine stupid!"
+ The puzzles felt pretty casual, while taking a bit more thought later in the game. Personally, I enjoy puzzle games that are a bit less challenging.

24722868.review:
Bought it for the blasphemy, stayed for the gameplay.

This game tells the historically accurate story of jesus, the romans and a boulder, but it adds a little time traveling twiwst to it. The puzzles are getting harder and timing becomes more important as you progress through the 50 levels this game has to offer. A little downside is the fact that you'll need some (or a lot) of faith in some later levels because there are very luck based situations.
Save Jesus will take you about two hours to finish with all stars, which is a fair amount of gameplay for 1,60€ in my opinion. It's better than the coke you'd get for that money and no coke get's you to hell this fast.
You can put more time in it to get all the achievements, but they basically force you to beat every level seven times.

8/10 awaiting Muhammad DLC
